channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic lights stuck on red AGAIN, 4th January
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights at the junction of lynton and Dunton Road are all stuck on red again - causing congestion and dangerous conditions for pedestrians and motorists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunton Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lampost bent and damaged, 4th January
item.description:
This lampost in the middle of the traffic island is bent and seems to be missing the light at the top

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenoaks Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Build up litter over X mas & NY period, 4th January
item.description:
Build up of litter along Hengist - Ethelbert, Horsa Rd & Northumberland. There generally more rubbish and lots of tissue & toilet paper ( no idea where this comes from) in roads & pavements please can the scheduled highways road litter pick take place especially as it not been done since before Christmas?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hengist Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned rubbish, 4th January
item.description:
There's a big bunch of rubbish in the street. I've already reported this and got an update stating that the issue was solved but that stuff is still there. Can you please send someone over to remove it and also give a good clean at the entire street?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rosina Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes dumped and left in basement area, 4th January
item.description:
Council need to get the person/people from 25 Bew Court to remove their bikes. E-bike has been left there for 16months. Cleaner who has been living in the cleaners staff room and shed area leaves his bike here too. Sometimes there can be up to 3-4 bikes left unattended here at one time. It is a danger safety hazard. Other tenants have reported this matter and still nothing done or resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping bin bags, 4th January
item.description:
X2 bin bags at end of alley way at the Northumberland end of Hengist Rd

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hengist Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing fly tipping issue on Grove Lane, 4th January
item.description:
Once again this single green bin is overflowing with fly tipped rubbish. Rather than just using council resources to clear it, why can’t a permanent solution be found? It’s a health hazard, an eye sore and affects everyone on the street. Photo taken 5 January.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Grove Lane, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa and various items dumped overnight blocking pavement, 4th January
item.description:
As above

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lakedale Road, Plumstead

item.title: Bins not emptied for a number of weeks, 4th January
item.description:
Communal bins (general rubbish, recycling and food waste) for mylne apartments (93 Barrett’s grove, N168AP) haven’t been emptied for a number of weeks now. Bins are completely overflowing and urgently need to be emptied.This has become a reoccurring issue
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barretts Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grifter required! Road is iced over and dangerous, 4th January
item.description:
Residents cannot leave their homes and children cannot access school due to build up of ice on the hill! Please sent the gritters to the top of Beddington Road!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beddington Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witham Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: People have dumped alot of rubbish my the recycle bins on every corner of the play space including beds and mattresses, 4th January
item.description:
There is a huge pile of rubbish by one of the bins and also rubbish and beds and mattresses surrounding the other bins. We also have a rat problem in this area so leaving this too long will escalate an already big problem.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haddo Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glengall Road, London

item.title: Ice, 4th January
item.description:
Treacherous conditions on roads in Towncourt crescent and surrounding roads for the past 5 days. Where are the gritters? This is not acceptable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Crescent, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
